extensionDescription.message: A secure, encrypted tunnel to the web to protect yourself everywhere you use Firefox.

viewExemptTab.message: This tab is not protected by the Private Network proxy service. Your location is visible to ad trackers and websites you visit in this tab.

toastLastPassAvailable.message: You have 1 new Firefox Private Network pass!

toastPassesAvailable.message: You have $number$ new Firefox Private Network passes!

toastLastPassExpired.message: You've used all your free passes for this month.

toastPassExpired.message: Pass expired. Firefox Private Network is off.

toastWarning.message: Firefox Private Network needs your attention!

toastTabExempt.message: Firefox Private Network is temporarily disabled.

viewGeoFailure.message: At this time, Firefox Private Network is not available in your region. You must be in the United States to complete the setup process.

viewLoading.message: Establishing connection to Firefox Private Network. This should take just a few more moments.

viewLoginMessage.message: To start using Private Network, sign in to your Firefox account or create one.

viewMainActive.message: Your connection is secure, and your location is hidden from websites and trackers, making it tougher for those annoying targeted ads to follow you around online.

viewMainActiveLimited.message: Private Network reduces ad tracking, encrypts your Firefox browsing, and hides your location. Passes run without stopping for 8 hours.

viewMainInactive.message: Private Network is not protecting your Firefox connection. Websites, ad trackers, and your internet service provider may be able to see your online activity.

viewMainInactiveWithPasses.message: To claim a pass, turn on Private Network. This reduces ad tracking, encrypts your Firefox browsing, and hides your location. Passes run without stopping for 8 hours.

viewMainInactiveWithoutPasses.message: Upgrade for unlimited access to Private Network to encrypt your browsing and hide your location.

viewOffline.message: You are offline. Check your network connection and try again.

viewOtherInUse.message: You cannot use Firefox Private Network because you are using a custom proxy setting.

viewProxyError.message: Firefox Private Network encountered an unknown issue. Try turning it off, then on again.

loadingError.message: Connection timeout, check your internet connection.
